backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, tickets, withdrawals, layanan, tasks, and access‑controlled CRUD with superadmin claiming and role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend route additions and related components for dashboard pages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including routing, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with color variables, dark mode values, and global border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining root, landing, auth, internal, and seven dashboard routes with a custom 404 component.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Footer component showing logo and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Sticky header with logo variants and navigation buttons for client login, layanan scroll, and partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Hero section with large image, headline text, scroll‑to‑layanan CTA, and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Section inviting users to join the team with a button navigating to partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Landing page component with hero content, service phase cards, and navigation to the layanan section.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Static data file defining layanan tiers, pricing, benefits, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Displays layanan packages in an accordion layout using data from layananCopy.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Simple closing section showing a brief reassurance message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
Admin dashboard layout with tabbed sections for users, layanan, tasks, approvals, and logs.
frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDa: Dashboard UI for assistants with summary stats and multi-tab sections for profile, summary, and task management.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Client dashboard showing task summaries, personal notes, and navigational tabs for profile, services, tasks, history, tickets, and concierge hub.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: Login page for clients with buttons for simulated authentication and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Client registration form collecting basic info and showing a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDa: Concierge dashboard with multiple placeholder tabs for search, tickets, creation, handling, and completed items.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashbo: Finance dashboard featuring tabs for earnings, withdrawals, exports, and logs, all currently placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page handling Internet Identity auth, role workspace selection, and superadmin claim flow.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal registration form collecting basic info and role, ending with a submission confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/management/Management: Management dashboard with tabbed sections for summary and metrics placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/manajer/ManajerDashbo: Manager dashboard featuring monitoring, approval, and log tabs with placeholder content.
Partner login page with Internet Identity button, workspace access, and link to registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Partner dashboard showing summary stats and tabs for profile, tasks, history, and wallet.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Partner registration form collecting basic info and showing a confirmation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/Stra: React dashboard page with header, tab navigation, placeholder tab content, and footer for strategic partners.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: React dashboard page with header, tab navigation, placeholder sections, and footer for superadmin users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameter retrieval.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, shadows, animations, and loading plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required frontend route additions and constraints for updating App.tsx.
